availability.backupFrequency: Real-time database replication with hourly snapshots

usability.learnability: Small business owners can create first campaign in under 30 minutes
usability.efficiency: Experienced users can launch campaigns in under 10 minutes
usability.memorability: Users return after 30 days and complete tasks without re-learning

accessibility.colorContrast: 4.5:1 minimum ratio for normal text, 3:1 for large text

scalability.dataGrowth: Handle 1TB+ of campaign assets and analytics data per year

reliability.faultTolerance: Graceful degradation when AI services are unavailable
reliability.gracefulDegradation: Basic campaign creation available even when AI features are down
